page.title: 03HEALTH IN EAST LEAKE
page.content: East Leake's health centre is based in the centre of the village,adjacent to the library. The practice consists of four doctors and the necessary nurses and staff.The practice serves East Leake and its surrounding area. Doctors report that approximately nine-thousand people are registered patients. Careful monitoring of people takes place from the day they are born by means of health visitors,the school nurse,etc. A dentist attends regularly and a speech therapist,based at the centre,keeps close links with schools. The school nurse has a very important role,spending much of her time in schools and liaising between home,school and doctor. The practice,in the main,refers its patients to Nottm.Queen's Med.Centre.
